entry.tran: 体弱无力的；站立不稳的；踉踉跄跄的
entry.def: If you feel groggy, you feel weak and rather ill.

example.ex: She was feeling a bit groggy when I saw her.
example.tran: 我看见她的时候，她有点虚弱无力。

means.word_mean: 1. stunned or confused and slow to react (as from blows or drunkenness or exhaustion)
